 2926: spawn_huge_arglist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2927:     %% Huge in two different ways; encoded size and
 2928:     %% length...
 2929:     ArgListHead = [make_ref(),
 2930:                    lists:duplicate(1000000, $a),
 2931:                    <<1:8388608>>,
 2932:                    processes(),
 2933:                    erlang:ports(),
 2934:                    {hej, hopp},
 2935:                    <<17:8388608>>,
 2936:                    lists:duplicate(3000000, $x),
 2937:                    #{ a => 1, b => 2, c => 3, d => 4, e => 5}],
 2938:     ArgList = ArgListHead ++ lists:seq(1, 255 - length(ArgListHead)),
 2939: 
 2940:     io:format("size(term_to_binary(ArgList)) = ~p~n",
 2941:               [size(term_to_binary(ArgList))]),
 2942: 
 2943:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on local node...~n", []),
 2944:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(true, node(), ArgList),
 2945:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on local node with Node...~n", []),
 2946:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(false, node(), ArgList),
 2947:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 2948:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 2949:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 2950:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(false, Node, ArgList),
 2951:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 2952:     ok.
 2953: 
 2954: spawn_huge_arglist_test(Local, Node, ArgList) ->
 2955: 
 2956:     R1 = case Local of
 2957:              true ->
 2958:                  spawn_request(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor]);
 2959:              false ->
 2960:                  spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor])
 2961:          end,
 2962:     receive
 2963:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, Pid1} ->
 2964:             Pid1 ! go,
 2965:             receive
 2966:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, Pid1, Reason1} ->
 2967:                     ArgList = Reason1
 2968:             end
 2969:     end,
 2970: 
 2971:     {Pid2, R2} = case Local of
 2972:                      true ->
 2973:                          spawn_monitor(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 2974:                      false ->
 2975:                          spawn_monitor(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 2976:                  end,
 2977:     Node = node(Pid2),
 2978:     Pid2 ! go,
 2979:     receive
 2980:         {'DOWN', R2, process, Pid2, Reason2} ->
 2981:             ArgList = Reason2
 2982:     end,
 2983:     
 2984:     {Pid3, R3} = case Local of
 2985:                      true ->
 2986:                          spawn_opt(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor]);
 2987:                      false ->
 2988:                          spawn_opt(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor])
 2989:                  end,
 2990:     Node = node(Pid3),
 2991:     Pid3 ! go,
 2992:     receive
 2993:         {'DOWN', R3, process, Pid3, Reason3} ->
 2994:             ArgList = Reason3
 2995:     end,
 2996: 
 2997:     OldTA = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2998:     Pid4 = case Local of
 2999:                true ->
 3000:                    spawn_link(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3001:                false ->
 3002:                    spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3003:            end,
 3004:     Node = node(Pid4),
 3005:     Pid4 ! go,
 3006:     receive
 3007:         {'EXIT', Pid4, Reason4} ->
 3008:             ArgList = Reason4
 3009:     end,
 3010: 
 3011:     true = process_flag(trap_exit, OldTA),
 3012: 
 3013:     Pid5 = case Local of
 3014:                true ->
 3015:                    spawn(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3016:                false ->
 3017:                    spawn(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3018:            end,
 3019:     Node = node(Pid5),
 3020:     R5 = erlang:monitor(process, Pid5),
 3021:     Pid5 ! go,
 3022:     receive
 3023:         {'DOWN', R5, process, Pid5, Reason5} ->
 3024:             ArgList = Reason5
 3025:     end,
 3026:     ok.
 3027: 
 3028: spawn_request_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3029:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node...~n", []),
 3030:     spawn_request_bif_test(true, node()),
 3031:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node with Node...~n", []),
 3032:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, node()),
 3033:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3034:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 3035:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, Node),
 3036:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3037:     ok.
 3038:                        
 3039: spawn_request_bif_test(Local, Node) ->
 3040: 
 3041:     Me = self(),
 3042: 
 3043:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3044: 
 3045:     T1 = {test, 1},
 3046:     F1 = fun () -> exit({exit, T1}) end,
 3047:     R1 = if Local ->
 3048:                  spawn_request(F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link]);
 3049:             true ->
 3050:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link])
 3051:          end,
 3052:     receive
 3053:         {T1, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3054:             receive
 3055:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3056:                     ok
 3057:             end,
 3058:             receive
 3059:                 {'EXIT', P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3060:                     ok
 3061:             end
 3062:     end,
 3063: 
 3064:     R1b = if Local ->
 3065:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitor, link]);
 3066:             true ->
 3067:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitor, link])
 3068:          end,
 3069:     receive
 3070:         {spawn_reply, R1b, ok, P1b} ->
 3071:             receive
 3072:                 {'DOWN', R1b, process, P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3073:                     ok
 3074:             end,
 3075:             receive
 3076:                 {'EXIT', P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3077:                     ok
 3078:             end
 3079:     end,
 3080: 
 3081:     Ref1c = make_ref(),
 3082:     F1c = fun () -> Me ! Ref1c end,
 3083:     R1c = if Local ->
 3084:                   spawn_request(F1c);
 3085:              true ->
 3086:                   spawn_request(Node, F1c)
 3087:             end,
 3088:     receive
 3089:         {spawn_reply, R1c, ok, _P1c} ->
 3090:             receive Ref1c -> ok end
 3091:     end,
 3092: 
 3093:     R1e = if Local ->
 3094:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}]);
 3095:             true ->
 3096:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}])
 3097:          end,
 3098:     receive
 3099:         {T1, R1e, error, BadOpt1} ->
 3100:             badopt = BadOpt1,
 3101:             ok
 3102:     end,
 3103:     ok = try
 3104:              BadF = fun (X) -> exit({X,T1}) end,
 3105:              if Local ->
 3106:                      spawn_request(BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link]);
 3107:                 true ->
 3108:                      spawn_request(Node, BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link])
 3109:              end,
 3110:              nok
 3111:          catch
 3112:              error:badarg -> ok
 3113:          end,
 3114:     ok = try
 3115:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, F1, [monitor, link], T1),
 3116:              nok
 3117:          catch
 3118:              error:badarg -> ok
 3119:          end,
 3120: 
 3121:     T2 = {test, 2},
 3122:     M2 = erlang,
 3123:     F2 = exit,
 3124:     Reason2 = {exit, T2},
 3125:     Args2 = [Reason2],
 3126:     R2 = if Local ->
 3127:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}]);
 3128:             true ->
 3129:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}])
 3130:             end,
 3131:     receive
 3132:         {T2, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3133:             receive
 3134:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3135:                     ok
 3136:             end,
 3137:             receive
 3138:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3139:                     ok
 3140:             end
 3141:     end,
 3142: 
 3143:     R2b = if Local ->
 3144:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3145:             true ->
 3146:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3147:             end,
 3148:     receive
 3149:         {spawn_reply, R2b, ok, P2b} ->
 3150:             receive
 3151:                 {'DOWN', R2b, process, P2b, Reason2} ->
 3152:                     ok
 3153:             end,
 3154:             receive
 3155:                 {'EXIT', P2b, Reason2} ->
 3156:                     ok
 3157:             end
 3158:     end,
 3159: 
 3160:     Ref2c = make_ref(),
 3161:     R2c = if Local ->
 3162:                   spawn_request(erlang, send, [Me, Ref2c]);
 3163:              true ->
 3164:                   spawn_request(Node, erlang, send, [Me, Ref2c])
 3165:             end,
 3166:     receive
 3167:         {spawn_reply, R2c, ok, _P2c} ->
 3168:             receive Ref2c -> ok end
 3169:     end,
 3170: 
 3171:     R2e = if Local ->
 3172:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links]);
 3173:             true ->
 3174:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links])
 3175:          end,
 3176:     receive
 3177:         {T2, R2e, error, BadOpt2} ->
 3178:             badopt = BadOpt2,
 3179:             ok
 3180:     end,
 3181: 
 3182:     R2eb = if Local ->
 3183:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, links]);
 3184:             true ->
 3185:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, links])
 3186:          end,
 3187:     receive
 3188:         {spawn_reply, R2eb, error, BadOpt2b} ->
 3189:             badopt = BadOpt2b,
 3190:             ok
 3191:     end,
 3192: 
 3193:     ok = try
 3194:              if Local ->
 3195:                      spawn_request(M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}]);
 3196:                 true ->
 3197:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}])
 3198:              end,
 3199:              nok
 3200:          catch
 3201:              error:badarg -> ok
 3202:          end,
 3203:     ok = try
 3204:              if Local ->
 3205:                      spawn_request(M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, {reply_tag, blupp}, link]);
 3206:                 true ->
 3207:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, {reply_tag, blupp}, link])
 3208:              end,
 3209:              nok
 3210:          catch
 3211:              error:badarg -> ok
 3212:          end,
 3213:     ok = try
 3214:              if Local ->
 3215:                      spawn_request(M2, F2, [Args2|oops]);
 3216:                 true ->
 3217:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, [Args2|oops])
 3218:              end,
 3219:              nok
 3220:          catch
 3221:              error:badarg -> ok
 3222:          end,
 3223:     ok = try
 3224:              if Local ->
 3225:                      spawn_request(M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, {reply_tag, T2}, link]);
 3226:                 true ->
 3227:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, {reply_tag, T2}, link])
 3228:              end,
 3229:              nok
 3230:          catch
 3231:              error:badarg -> ok
 3232:          end,
 3233:     ok = try
 3234:              if Local ->
 3235:                      spawn_request(M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3236:                 true ->
 3237:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3238:              end,
 3239:              nok
 3240:          catch
 3241:              error:badarg -> ok
 3242:          end,
 3243:     ok = try
 3244:              if Local ->
 3245:                      spawn_request(M2, <<"exit">>, Args2);
 3246:                 true ->
 3247:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, <<"exit">>, Args2)
 3248:              end,
 3249:              nok
 3250:          catch
 3251:              error:badarg -> ok
 3252:          end,
 3253:     ok = try
 3254:              if Local ->
 3255:                      spawn_request(<<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [{reply_tag, T2}, monitor, link]);
 3256:                 true ->
 3257:                      spawn_request(Node, <<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [{reply_tag, T2}, monitor, link])
 3258:              end,
 3259:              nok
 3260:          catch
 3261:              error:badarg -> ok
 3262:          end,
 3263:     ok = try
 3264:              if Local ->
 3265:                      spawn_request(<<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3266:                 true ->
 3267:                      spawn_request(Node, <<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3268:              end,
 3269:              nok
 3270:          catch
 3271:              error:badarg -> ok
 3272:          end,
 3273:     ok = try
 3274:              if Local ->
 3275:                      spawn_request(<<"erlang">>, F2, Args2);
 3276:                 true ->
 3277:                      spawn_request(Node, <<"erlang">>, F2, Args2)
 3278:              end,
 3279:              nok
 3280:          catch
 3281:              error:badarg -> ok
 3282:          end,
 3283:     ok = try
 3284:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, M2, F2, Args2, [{reply_tag, T2}, monitor, link]),
 3285:              nok
 3286:          catch
 3287:              error:badarg -> ok
 3288:          end,
 3289:     ok = try
 3290:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]),
 3291:              nok
 3292:          catch
 3293:              error:badarg -> ok
 3294:          end,
 3295:     ok = try
 3296:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, M2, F2, Args2),
 3297:              nok
 3298:          catch
 3299:              error:badarg -> ok
 3300:          end,
 3301:     ok.

 3304: spawn_request_monitor_demonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3305:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3306:     BlockFun = fun () ->
 3307:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3308:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, 1000),
 3309:                        ok
 3310:                end,
 3311: 
 3312:     %% Block receiver node...
 3313:     spawn_request(Node, BlockFun, [{priority,max}, link]),
 3314:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3315: 
 3316:     erlang:yield(),
 3317:     R = spawn_request(Node, timer, sleep, [10000], [monitor]),
 3318:     %% Should not be possible to demonitor
 3319:     %% before operation has succeeded...
 3320:     {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3321:     false = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]), %% Should be ignored by VM...
 3322:     receive
 3323:         {spawn_reply, R, ok, P} ->
 3324:             {monitors, [{process,P}]} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3325:             true = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]),
 3326:             {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3327:             exit(P, kill)
 3328:     end,
 3329:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3330:     ok.
 3331: 
 3332: spawn_request_monitor_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3333:     %% Early child exit...
 3334:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3335:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [monitor, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3336:     receive
 3337:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3338:             receive
 3339:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3340:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3341:             end
 3342:     end,
 3343:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3344:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, monitor]),
 3345:     receive
 3346:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3347:             receive
 3348:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3349:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3350:             end
 3351:     end,
 3352:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3353:     ok.
 3354: 
 3355: spawn_request_link_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3356:     %% Early child exit...
 3357:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3358:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3359:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, link]),
 3360:     receive
 3361:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3362:             receive
 3363:                 {'EXIT', P1, Reason1} ->
 3364:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3365:             end
 3366:     end,
 3367:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3368:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [link, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3369:     receive
 3370:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3371:             receive
 3372:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3373:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3374:             end
 3375:     end,
 3376:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3377:     ok.
 3378: 
 3379: spawn_request_link_parent_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3380:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), false),
 3381:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3382:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, false),
 3383:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3384:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3385: 
 3386: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_compound_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3387:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), true),
 3388:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3389:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, true),
 3390:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3391:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3392: 
 3393: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, CompoundExitReason) ->
 3394:     %% Early parent exit...
 3395:     Tester = self(),
 3396: 
 3397:     ExitReason = if CompoundExitReason -> "kaboom";
 3398:                     true -> kaboom
 3399:                  end,
 3400: 
 3401:     verify_nc(node()),
 3402: 
 3403:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3404:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3405: 
 3406:     ParentFun = case node() == Node of
 3407:                     true ->
 3408:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3409:                                 spawn_request(?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3410:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3411:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3412:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3413:                         end;
 3414:                     false ->
 3415:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3416:                                 spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3417:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3418:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3419:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3420:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3421:                         end
 3422:                 end,
 3423:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3424:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3425:                                             %% Give parent some work to do when
 3426:                                             %% exiting and by this increase
 3427:                                             %% possibilities for races...
 3428:                                             T = ets:new(x,[]),
 3429:                                             ets:insert(T, lists:map(fun (I) ->
 3430:                                                                             {I,I}
 3431:                                                                     end,
 3432:                                                                     lists:seq(1,10000))),
 3433:                                             ParentFun(N rem 10) end,
 3434:                                     [{priority, max}])
 3435:                   end,
 3436:                   lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 3437:     N = gather_parent_exits(ExitReason, false),
 3438:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3439:                     fun () ->
 3440:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3441:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3442:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3443:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3444:                                       end, processes())
 3445:                     end),
 3446:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3447:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3448:                       (_) ->
 3449:                           ok
 3450:                   end, CFs),
 3451:     Comment =
 3452:         "Got "
 3453:         ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3454:         ++ if node() == Node -> " node local";
 3455:                   true -> " node remote"
 3456:            end
 3457:         ++ if CompoundExitReason -> " \"kaboom\"";
 3458:               true -> " \'kaboom\'"
 3459:            end
 3460:         ++ " exits!",
 3461:     erlang:display(Comment),
 3462:     Comment.
 3463: 
 3464: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3465:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3466:     N = 1000,
 3467:     ExitCounter = spawn(Node, fun exit_counter/0),
 3468:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 3469:                           spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node)
 3470:                   end,
 3471:                   lists:seq(1, N)),
 3472:     ResRef = make_ref(),
 3473:     ExitCounter ! {get_results, self(), ResRef},
 3474:     Cmnt = receive
 3475:                {ResRef, CntMap} ->
 3476:                    lists:flatten(
 3477:                      ["In total ", integer_to_list(N), " exits. ",
 3478:                       "Detected exits: ",
 3479:                       maps:fold(fun (ExitReason, Count, "") ->
 3480:                                         io_lib:format("~p exit ~p times",
 3481:                                                       [ExitReason, Count]);
 3482:                                     (ExitReason, Count, Acc) ->
 3483:                                         [Acc, io_lib:format("; ~p exit ~p times",
 3484:                                                             [ExitReason, Count])]
 3485:                                 end,
 3486:                                 "",
 3487:                                 CntMap),
 3488:                       "."])
 3489:            end,
 3490:     io:format("~s~n", [Cmnt]),
 3491:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3492:     {comment, Cmnt}.
 3493: 
 3494: exit_counter() ->
 3495:     true = register(exit_counter, self()),
 3496:     exit_counter(#{}).
 3497: 
 3498: exit_counter(CntMap) ->
 3499:     receive
 3500:         {get_results, From, Ref} ->
 3501:             From ! {Ref, CntMap};
 3502:         {exit, Reason} ->
 3503:             OldCnt = maps:get(Reason, CntMap, 0),
 3504:             exit_counter(CntMap#{Reason => OldCnt+1})
 3505:     end.
 3506: 
 3507: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node) ->
 3508:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 3509:     ChildFun = fun () ->
 3510:                        process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3511:                        receive
 3512:                            {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3513:                                exit_counter ! {exit, Reason}
 3514:                        end
 3515:                end,
 3516:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3517:                                        _ReqID = spawn_request(Node,
 3518:                                                               ChildFun,
 3519:                                                               [link,
 3520:                                                                {priority,max}]),
 3521:                                        exit(bye)
 3522:                                end),
 3523:     receive
 3524:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3525:             bye = Reason,
 3526:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node)
 3527:     end,
 3528:     ok.
 3529: 
 3530: 
 3531: spawn_request_abandon_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3532:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3533:     false = spawn_request_abandon(make_ref()),
 3534:     false = spawn_request_abandon(spawn_request(fun () -> ok end)),
 3535:     false = spawn_request_abandon(rpc:call(Node, erlang, make_ref, [])),
 3536:     try
 3537:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(self()) 
 3538:     catch
 3539:         error:badarg ->
 3540:             ok
 3541:     end,
 3542:     try
 3543:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(4711)
 3544:     catch
 3545:         error:badarg ->
 3546:             ok
 3547:     end,
 3548: 
 3549:     verify_nc(node()),
 3550: 
 3551:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3552:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3553: 
 3554: 
 3555:     TotOps = 1000,
 3556:     Tester = self(),
 3557: 
 3558:     ParentFun = fun (Wait, Opts) ->
 3559:                         ReqId = spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3560:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3561:                                               [Tester], Opts),
 3562:                         receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3563:                         case spawn_request_abandon(ReqId) of
 3564:                             true ->
 3565:                                 ok;
 3566:                             false ->
 3567:                                 receive
 3568:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, _} ->
 3569:                                         exit(spawn_failed);
 3570:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, Pid} ->
 3571:                                         unlink(Pid),
 3572:                                         exit(Pid, bye)
 3573:                                 after
 3574:                                     0 ->
 3575:                                         exit(missing_spawn_reply)
 3576:                                 end
 3577:                         end
 3578:                 end,
 3579:     %% Parent exit early...
 3580:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3581:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3582:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link])
 3583:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3584:                   end,
 3585:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3586:     NoA1 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3587:     %% Parent exit late...
 3588:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3589:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3590:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link]),
 3591:                                             receive
 3592:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3593:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3594:                                             after
 3595:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3596:                                             end
 3597:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3598:                   end,
 3599:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3600:     NoA2 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3601:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3602:                     fun () ->
 3603:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3604:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3605:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3606:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3607:                                       end, processes())
 3608:                     end),
 3609:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3610:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3611:                       (_) ->
 3612:                           ok
 3613:                   end, CFs),
 3614:     %% Parent exit early...
 3615:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3616:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3617:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [])
 3618:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3619:                   end,
 3620:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3621:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3622:     %% Parent exit late...
 3623:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3624:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3625:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, []),
 3626:                                             receive
 3627:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3628:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3629:                                             after
 3630:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3631:                                             end
 3632:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3633:                   end,
 3634:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3635:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3636:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3637:     C = "Got " ++ integer_to_list(NoA1) ++ " and "
 3638:         ++ integer_to_list(NoA2) ++ " abandoneds of 2*"
 3639:         ++ integer_to_list(TotOps) ++ " ops!",
 3640:     true = NoA1 /= 0,
 3641:     true = NoA1 /= TotOps,
 3642:     true = NoA2 /= 0,
 3643:     true = NoA2 /= TotOps,
 3644:     {comment, C}.
 3645: 
 3646: spawn_request_test_exit_child(Tester) ->
 3647:   Child = self(),
 3648:   _ = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3649:                         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3650:                         receive
 3651:                             {'EXIT', Child, Reason} ->
 3652:                                 Tester ! {parent_exit, Reason}
 3653:                         end
 3654:                 end, [link,{priority,max}]),
 3655:   receive after infinity -> ok end.
 3656: 
 3657: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther) ->
 3658:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3659:     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, 0).
 3660: 
 3661: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N) ->
 3662:     receive
 3663:         {parent_exit, Reason} ->
 3664:             gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N+1);
 3665:         {parent_exit, _} = ParentExit ->
 3666:             case AllowOther of
 3667:                 false ->
 3668:                     ct:fail(ParentExit);
 3669:                 true ->
 3670:                     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N)
 3671:             end
 3672:     after 0 ->
 3673:             N
 3674:     end.
 3675: dist_spawn_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3676:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3677:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3678:     receive
 3679:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3680:             receive
 3681:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3682:                     hej = Reason1
 3683:             end
 3684:     end,
 3685:     {P2, Mon2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3686:     receive
 3687:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3688:             hej = Reason2
 3689:     end,
 3690:     {P3, Mon3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3691:     receive
 3692:         {'DOWN', Mon3, process, P3, Reason3} ->
 3693:             hej = Reason3
 3694:     end,
 3695:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3696:     ok.
 3697: 
 3698: spawn_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3699:     %% Spawn against an ei node which does not support spawn
 3700:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 3701:     try
 3702:         %% First spawn triggering a new connection; which
 3703:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3704:         %% of spawn requests...
 3705:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3706:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, true),
 3707:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3708:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3709:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, false),
 3710:         ok
 3711:     after
 3712:         ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode)
 3713:     end.
 3714: 
 3715: spawn_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3716:     %% Same spawn tests against a two releases old node as against
 3717:     %% ei node above
 3718:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 3719:     OldRelName = OldRel ++ "_latest",
 3720:     %% We clear all ERL_FLAGS for the old node as all options may not
 3721:     %% be supported.
 3722:     ClearEnv = lists:foldl(
 3723:                  fun({Key,_Value}, Acc) ->
 3724:                          case re:run(Key,"^ERL_.*FLAGS$") of
 3725:                              {match,_} ->
 3726:                                  [{Key,""}|Acc];
 3727:                              nomatch ->
 3728:                                  Acc
 3729:                          end
 3730:                  end, [], os:env()),
 3731:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0, env => ClearEnv },
 3732:                       OldRelName,
 3733:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 3734: 	not_available ->
 3735:             {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
 3736:         {ok, Peer, OldNode} ->
 3737:             try
 3738:                 %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3739:                 %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3740:                 %% of spawn requests...
 3741:                 io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3742:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, true),
 3743:                 io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3744:                 %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3745:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, false),
 3746:                 ok
 3747:             after
 3748:                 peer:stop(Peer)
 3749:             end
 3750:     end.
 3751: 
 3752: spawn_against_new_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3753:     {ok, Peer, CurrNode} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3754:     try
 3755:         %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3756:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3757:         %% of spawn requests...
 3758:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3759:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, true),
 3760:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3761:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3762:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, false),
 3763:         ok
 3764:     after
 3765:         peer:stop(Peer)
 3766:     end.
 3767: 
 3768: spawn_ei_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3769:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() against ei node...", []),
 3770:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3771:     Ref1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3772:     receive
 3773:         {a_tag, Ref1, Err, Notsup} ->
 3774:             error = Err,
 3775:             notsup = Notsup,
 3776:             ok
 3777:     end,
 3778:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor() against ei node...", []),
 3779:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3780:     try
 3781:         spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej])
 3782:     catch
 3783:         error:notsup ->
 3784:             ok
 3785:     end,
 3786:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor against ei node...", []),
 3787:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3788:     {P0, M0} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3789:     receive
 3790:         {'DOWN', M0, process, P0, R0} ->
 3791:             notsup = R0
 3792:     end,
 3793:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link against ei node...", []),
 3794:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3795:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3796:     P1 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3797:     receive
 3798:         {'EXIT', P1, R1} ->
 3799:             notsup = R1
 3800:     end,
 3801:     io:format("Testing spawn_link() against ei node...", []),
 3802:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3803:     P2 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3804:     receive
 3805:         {'EXIT', P2, R2} ->
 3806:             notsup = R2
 3807:     end,
 3808:     ok.
 3809: 
 3810: disconnect_node(_Node, false) ->
 3811:     ok;
 3812: disconnect_node(Node, true) ->
 3813:     lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) andalso begin
 3814:         monitor_node(Node, true),
 3815:         true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 3816:         receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end
 3817:     end.
 3818: 
 3819: spawn_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3820:     io:format("Testing spawn_request()...", []),
 3821:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3822:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3823:     receive
 3824:         {a_tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3825:             Node = node(P1),
 3826:             receive
 3827:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, hej} -> ok
 3828:             end
 3829:     end,
 3830:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor()...", []),
 3831:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3832:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3833:     receive
 3834:         {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, hej} -> ok
 3835:     end,
 3836:     Node = node(P2),
 3837:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor...", []),
 3838:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3839:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3840:     receive
 3841:         {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, hej} -> ok
 3842:     end,
 3843:     Node = node(P3),
 3844:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link...", []),
 3845:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3846:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3847:     P4 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3848:     Node = node(P4),
 3849:     receive
 3850:         {'EXIT', P4, hej} ->
 3851:             ok
 3852:     end,
 3853:     io:format("Testing spawn_link()...", []),
 3854:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3855:     P5 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3856:     Node = node(P5),
 3857:     receive
 3858:         {'EXIT', P5, hej} ->
 3859:             ok
 3860:     end.
 3861: 
 3862: spawn_request_reply_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3863:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(undefined, node()),
 3864:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3865:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node).
 3866:     
 3867: spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node) ->
 3868:     io:format("Testing on node: ~p~n", [Node]),
 3869:     Parent = self(),
 3870:     Done1 = make_ref(),
 3871:     RID1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done1 end, [{reply, yes}]),
 3872:     receive Done1 -> ok end,
 3873:     receive
 3874:         {spawn_reply, RID1, ok, _} -> ok
 3875:     after 0 ->
 3876:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 3877:     end,
 3878:     Done2 = make_ref(),
 3879:     RID2 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done2 end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 3880:     receive Done2 -> ok end,
 3881:     receive
 3882:         {spawn_reply, RID2, ok, _} -> ok
 3883:     after 0 ->
 3884:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 3885:     end,
 3886:     Done3 = make_ref(),
 3887:     RID3 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done3 end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 3888:     receive Done3 -> ok end,
 3889:     receive
 3890:         {spawn_reply, RID3, _, _} ->
 3891:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3892:     after 0 ->
 3893:             ok
 3894:     end,
 3895:     Done4 = make_ref(),
 3896:     RID4 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done4 end, [{reply, no}]),
 3897:     receive Done4 -> ok end,
 3898:     receive
 3899:         {spawn_reply, RID4, _, _} ->
 3900:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3901:     after 0 ->
 3902:             ok
 3903:     end,
 3904:     RID5 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}, bad_option]),
 3905:     receive
 3906:         {spawn_reply, RID5, error, badopt} -> ok
 3907:     end,
 3908:     RID6 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}, bad_option]),
 3909:     receive
 3910:         {spawn_reply, RID6, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3911:     after 1000 -> ok
 3912:     end,
 3913:     RID7 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}, bad_option]),
 3914:     receive
 3915:         {spawn_reply, RID7, error, badopt} -> ok
 3916:     end,
 3917:     RID8 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}, bad_option]),
 3918:     receive
 3919:         {spawn_reply, RID8, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3920:     after 1000 -> ok
 3921:     end,
 3922:     RID8_1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, nahh}]),
 3923:     receive
 3924:         {spawn_reply, RID8_1, error, badopt} -> ok
 3925:     end,
 3926:     case Node == node() of
 3927:         true ->
 3928:             ok;
 3929:         false ->
 3930:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3931:             RID9 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}]),
 3932:             receive
 3933:                 {spawn_reply, RID9, error, noconnection} -> ok
 3934:             end,
 3935:             RID10 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 3936:             receive
 3937:                 {spawn_reply, RID10, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3938:             after 1000 -> ok
 3939:             end,
 3940:             RID11 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 3941:             receive
 3942:                 {spawn_reply, RID11, error, noconnection} -> ok
 3943:             end,
 3944:             RID12 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}]),
 3945:             receive
 3946:                 {spawn_reply, RID12, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3947:             after 1000 -> ok
 3948:             end,
 3949:             ok
 3950:     end.
 3951: 
 3952: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3953:     %% A process newly spawned via the distribution is passed the
 3954:     %% argument list to use as the first message followed by an intialization
 3955:     %% message. Those two messages *must* be the first messages in its queue
 3956:     %% when it begins execution. The parallel receive/send signal optimization
 3957:     %% could potentially cause reordering of messages if certain future
 3958:     %% changes are made. This test case tries to cause a situation where a
 3959:     %% message reordering potentially could happen, and hopefully will detect
 3960:     %% such problematic changes.
 3961:     Tester = self(),
 3962:     NoScheds = 8,
 3963:     NoSchedsStr = integer_to_list(NoScheds),
 3964:     NoSchedsList = lists:seq(1, NoScheds),
 3965:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+S"++NoSchedsStr++":"++NoSchedsStr]),
 3966:     AttackMsg = make_ref(),
 3967:     AttackArgList = [Tester, AttackMsg],
 3968:     OkMsg = make_ref(),
 3969:     As = lists:map(
 3970:            fun (_) ->
 3971:                    spawn_opt(
 3972:                      Node,
 3973:                      fun () ->
 3974:                              dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(AttackArgList,
 3975:                                                               1000)
 3976:                      end, [{priority, high}, link])
 3977:            end, NoSchedsList),
 3978:     Relay = spawn_opt(
 3979:               Node,
 3980:               fun () ->
 3981:                       receive
 3982:                           {attack, Victim} ->
 3983:                               lists:foreach(fun (A) ->
 3984:                                                     A ! {attack, Victim}
 3985:                                             end, As)
 3986:                       end
 3987:               end, [{priority, max}, link]),
 3988:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3989:     Victim = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, send, [Tester, OkMsg],
 3990:                        [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 3991:                         {priority, normal},
 3992:                         link]),
 3993:     Relay ! {attack, Victim},
 3994:     receive
 3995:         OkMsg ->
 3996:             ok;
 3997:         AttackMsg ->
 3998:             ct:fail(child_process_used_message_as_argument_list)
 3999:     end,
 4000:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 4001:                           unlink(P)
 4002:                   end, [Victim] ++ [Relay] ++ As),
 4003:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4004:     ok.
 4005: 
 4006: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N) ->
 4007:     receive
 4008:         {attack, Victim} ->
 4009:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Victim, Msg, N)
 4010:     after
 4011:         0 ->
 4012:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N)
 4013:     end.
 4014: 
 4015: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(_Pid, _Msg, 0) ->
 4016:     ok;
 4017: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N) ->
 4018:     Pid ! Msg,
 4019:     dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N-1).
 4020: 
 4021: processes_term_proc_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4022:     Tester = self(),
 4023: 
 4024:     Run = fun(Args) ->
 4025:               {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 4026:               RT = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 4027:                               receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4028:                               as_expected = processes_term_proc_list_test(false),
 4029:                               Tester ! {it_worked, self()}
 4030:                       end),
 4031:               receive {it_worked, RT} -> ok end,
 4032:               stop_node(Peer, Node)
 4033:           end,
 4034: 
 4035:     %% We have to run this test case with +S1 since instrument:allocations()
 4036:     %% will report a free()'d block as present until it's actually deallocated
 4037:     %% by its employer.
 4038:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "false", "+S1"]),
 4039:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "true", "+S1"]),
 4040: 
 4041:     ok.
 4042: 
 4043: %% OTP-18322: Send msg to spawning process pid returned from processes/0
 4044: processes_send_infant(_Config) ->
 4045:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 4046:         1 ->
 4047:             {skip, "Only one scheduler online"};
 4048:         NScheds ->
 4049:             processes_send_infant_do(NScheds)
 4050:     end.
 4051: 
 4052: processes_send_infant_do(NScheds) ->
 4053:     IgnoreList = erlang:processes(),
 4054:     IgnorePids = maps:from_keys(IgnoreList, ignore),
 4055:     Tester = self(),
 4056: 
 4057:     %% To provoke bug we need sender and spawner on different schedulers.
 4058:     %% Let spawners use schedulers nr 2 to NScheds
 4059:     NSpawnerScheds = NScheds - 1,
 4060:     NSpawners = 2 * NSpawnerScheds,
 4061:     [spawn_link(fun() ->
 4062:                         processes_send_infant_spawner((I rem  NSpawnerScheds) + 2,
 4063:                                                       Tester, Tester, 1)
 4064:                 end)
 4065:      || I <- lists:seq(0, NSpawners-1)],
 4066: 
 4067:     %% and make sure sender use scheduler 1
 4068:     {Sender,SenderMon} =
 4069:         spawn_opt(
 4070:           fun() ->
 4071:                   timeout = processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4072:           end,
 4073:           [link, monitor, {scheduler,1}]),
 4074: 
 4075:     %% Run test for a little while and see if VM crashes
 4076:     {ok, _TRef} = timer:send_after(1000, Sender, timeout),
 4077:     {'DOWN', SenderMon, process, Sender, normal} = receive_any(),
 4078: 
 4079:     %% Stop spawners and collect stats
 4080:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4081:                                     {processes_send_infant, stop},
 4082:                                     IgnorePids),
 4083:     {TotSpawn, TheLastOfUs} =
 4084:         lists:foldl(fun(_, {SpawnCnt, Pids}) ->
 4085:                             {Pid, Generation} = receive_any(),
 4086:                             io:format("Got ~p from ~p\n", [Generation, Pid]),
 4087:                             {SpawnCnt+Generation, [Pid | Pids]}
 4088:                     end,
 4089:                     {0, []},
 4090:                     lists:seq(1, NSpawners)),
 4091:     io:format("Total spawned processes: ~p\n", [TotSpawn]),
 4092:     Aliens = (erlang:processes() -- IgnoreList) -- TheLastOfUs,
 4093:     io:format("Alien processes: ~p\n", [Aliens]),
 4094:     ok.
 4095: 
 4096: 
 4097: 
 4098: processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids) ->
 4099:     %% Send message identifying this test case, in case we send
 4100:     %% to alien processes spawned during the test.
 4101:     Msg = processes_send_infant,
 4102:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4103:                                     Msg,
 4104:                                     IgnorePids),
 4105:     receive timeout -> timeout
 4106:     after 0 ->
 4107:             processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4108:     end.
 4109: 
 4110: processes_send_infant_broadcast([Pid | Tail], Msg, IgnorePids) ->
 4111:     case maps:is_key(Pid, IgnorePids) of
 4112:         false ->
 4113:             Pid ! Msg;
 4114:         true ->
 4115:             ignore
 4116:     end,
 4117:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(Tail, Msg, IgnorePids);
 4118: processes_send_infant_broadcast([], _, _) ->
 4119:     ok.
 4120: 
 4121: processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester, Parent, Generation) ->
 4122:     link(Tester),
 4123:     case receive_any() of
 4124:         processes_send_infant ->
 4125:             case Parent of
 4126:                 Tester -> ok;
 4127:                 _ -> Parent ! {die, self()}
 4128:             end,
 4129:             Self = self(),
 4130:             Child = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 4131:                                       processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester,
 4132:                                                                     Self,
 4133:                                                                     Generation+1)
 4134:                               end,
 4135:                              [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4136:                               {scheduler, Sched}]),
 4137:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4138: 
 4139:         {processes_send_infant, stop} ->
 4140:             Tester ! {self(), Generation}
 4141:     end.
 4142: 
 4143: process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child) ->
 4144:     %% Parent stays alive only to ensure child gets stop message
 4145:     case receive_any() of
 4146:         processes_send_infant ->
 4147:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4148:         {die, Child} ->
 4149:             ok;
 4150:         {processes_send_infant, stop}=Stop ->
 4151:             %% We are not sure child was spawned when stop message was sent
 4152:             %% so we relay it.
 4153:             Child ! Stop
 4154:     end.
 4155: 
 4156: 
 4157: -define(CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MC, XB),
 4158: 	chk_term_proc_list(?LINE, MC, XB)).
 4159: 
 4160: chk_term_proc_list(Line, MustChk, ExpectBlks) ->
 4161:     Allocs = instrument:allocations(),
 4162:     case {MustChk, Allocs} of
 4163: 	{false, {error, not_enabled}} ->
 4164: 	    not_enabled;
 4165: 	{false, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} when ByOrigin =:= #{} ->
 4166: 	    not_enabled;
 4167: 	{_, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} ->
 4168:             ByType = maps:get(system, ByOrigin, #{}),
 4169:             Hist = maps:get(ptab_list_deleted_el, ByType, {}),
 4170: 	    case lists:sum(tuple_to_list(Hist)) of
 4171: 		ExpectBlks ->
 4172:                     ok;
 4173: 		Blks ->
 4174:                     exit({line, Line, mismatch,
 4175:                           expected, ExpectBlks,
 4176:                           actual, Blks})
 4177: 	    end
 4178:     end,
 4179:     ok.
 4180: 
 4181: processes_term_proc_list_test(MustChk) ->
 4182:     Tester = self(),
 4183:     enable_internal_state(),
 4184:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 4185:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 4186:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 4187:     #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 4188: 	tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 4189: 	tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 4190:     } = PBInfo,
 4191:     true = Chunks > 1,
 4192:     true = Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds,
 4193:     Processes = fun () ->
 4194: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 4195: 		WantReds),
 4196: 	    processes()
 4197:     end,
 4198:     Exit = fun (P) ->
 4199: 	    unlink(P),
 4200: 	    exit(P, bang),
 4201: 	    wait_until(
 4202: 		fun () ->
 4203: 			not lists:member(
 4204: 			    P,
 4205: 			    erts_debug:get_internal_state(
 4206: 				processes))
 4207: 		end)
 4208:     end,
 4209:     SpawnSuspendProcessesProc = fun () ->
 4210: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4211: 		  P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4212: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 4213: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 4214: 						   done,
 4215: 						   hd(Processes())},
 4216: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 4217: 				 end),
 4218: 		  receive {suspend_me, P} -> ok end,
 4219: 		  erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4220: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4221: 		  [{status,suspended},
 4222: 		   {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 4223: 		      = process_info(P, [status, current_function]),
 4224: 		  P
 4225: 	  end,
 4226:     ResumeProcessesProc = fun (P) ->
 4227: 					erlang:resume_process(P),
 4228: 					receive {P, done, _} -> ok end
 4229: 				end,
 4230:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4231:     HangAround = fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4232:     HA1 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4233:     HA2 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4234:     HA3 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4235:     S1 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4236:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4237:     Exit(HA1),
 4238:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4239:     S2 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4240:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4241:     S3 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4242:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4243:     Exit(HA2),
 4244:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4245:     S4 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4246:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4247:     Exit(HA3),
 4248:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4249:     ResumeProcessesProc(S1),
 4250:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4251:     ResumeProcessesProc(S3),
 4252:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4253:     ResumeProcessesProc(S4),
 4254:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4255:     ResumeProcessesProc(S2),
 4256:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4257:     Exit(S1),
 4258:     Exit(S2),
 4259:     Exit(S3),
 4260:     Exit(S4),
 4261: 
 4262: 
 4263:     HA4 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4264:     HA5 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4265:     HA6 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4266:     S5 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4267:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4268:     Exit(HA4),
 4269:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4270:     S6 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4271:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4272:     Exit(HA5),
 4273:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4274:     S7 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4275:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4276:     Exit(HA6),
 4277:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4278:     S8 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4279:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4280: 
 4281:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4282:     Exit(S8),
 4283:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4284:     Exit(S5),
 4285:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4286:     Exit(S7),
 4287:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4288:     Exit(S6),
 4289:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4290:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4291:     as_expected.
 4292: 
 4293: 
 4294: otp_7738_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4295:     otp_7738_test(waiting).
 4296: 
 4297: otp_7738_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4298:     otp_7738_test(suspended).
 4299: 
 4300: otp_7738_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4301:     otp_7738_test(resume).
 4302: 
 4303: otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4304:     sys_mem_cond_run(3072, fun () -> do_otp_7738_test(Type) end).
 4305: 
 4306: do_otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4307:     T = self(),
 4308:     S = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4309: 		receive
 4310: 		    {suspend, Suspendee} ->
 4311: 			erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 4312: 			T ! {suspended, Suspendee},
 4313: 			receive
 4314: 			after 10 ->
 4315: 				erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 4316: 				Suspendee ! wake_up
 4317: 			end;
 4318: 		    {send, To, Msg} ->
 4319: 			receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4320: 			To ! Msg
 4321: 		end
 4322: 	end),
 4323:     R = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4324: 		X = lists:seq(1, 20000000),
 4325: 		T ! {initialized, self()},
 4326: 		case Type of
 4327: 		    _ when Type == suspended;
 4328: 		Type == waiting ->
 4329: 		    receive _ -> ok end;
 4330: 		_ when Type == resume ->
 4331: 		    Receive = fun (F) ->
 4332: 			    receive
 4333: 				_ ->
 4334: 				    ok
 4335: 			    after 0 ->
 4336: 				    F(F)
 4337: 			    end
 4338: 		    end,
 4339: 		    Receive(Receive)
 4340: 	    end,
 4341: 	    T ! {woke_up, self()},
 4342: 	    id(X)
 4343:     end),
 4344:     receive {initialized, R} -> ok end,
 4345:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4346:     case Type of
 4347: 	      suspended ->
 4348: 		  erlang:suspend_process(R),
 4349: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4350: 	      waiting ->
 4351: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4352: 	      resume ->
 4353: 		  S ! {suspend, R},
 4354: 		  receive {suspended, R} -> ok end
 4355: 	  end,
 4356:     erlang:garbage_collect(R),
 4357:     case Type of
 4358: 	      suspended ->
 4359: 		  erlang:resume_process(R);
 4360: 	      _ ->
 4361: 		  ok
 4362: 	  end,
 4363:     receive
 4364: 	      {woke_up, R} ->
 4365: 		  ok
 4366: 	  after 2000 ->
 4367: 		  I = process_info(R, [status, message_queue_len]),
 4368: 		  io:format("~p~n", [I]),
 4369: 		  ct:fail(no_progress)
 4370: 	  end,
 4371:     ok.
 4372: 
 4373: gor(Reds, Stop) ->
 4374:     receive
 4375: 	drop_me ->
 4376: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);	    
 4377: 	{From, reds} ->
 4378: 	    From ! {reds, Reds, self()},
 4379: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);
 4380: 	{From, Stop} ->
 4381: 	    From ! {stopped, Stop, Reds, self()}
 4382:     after 0 ->
 4383: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop)
 4384:     end.
 4385: 
 4386: garb_other_running(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4387:     Stop = make_ref(),
 4388:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> gor(0, Stop) end),
 4389:     Reds = lists:foldl(fun (N, OldReds) ->
 4390: 			             case N rem 2 of
 4391: 					 0 -> Pid ! drop_me;
 4392: 					 _ -> ok
 4393: 				     end,
 4394: 				     erlang:garbage_collect(Pid),
 4395: 				     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4396: 				     Pid ! {self(), reds},
 4397: 				     receive
 4398: 					       {reds, NewReds, Pid} ->
 4399: 						   true = (NewReds > OldReds),
 4400: 						   NewReds
 4401: 					   end
 4402: 			     end,
 4403: 			     0,
 4404: 			     lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4405:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4406:     Pid ! {self(), Stop},
 4407:     receive
 4408: 	      {stopped, Stop, StopReds, Pid} ->
 4409: 		  true = (StopReds > Reds)
 4410: 	  end,
 4411:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 4412:     ok.
 4413: 
 4414: no_priority_inversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4415:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4416:     Master = self(),
 4417:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4418:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4419: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4420:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4421: 					       tok_loop()
 4422: 				       end,
 4423: 				       [{priority, high},
 4424:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4425:                                         monitor,
 4426:                                         link])
 4427: 		     end,
 4428: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4429:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, HTLs),
 4430:     LTL = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4431: 			    tok_loop()
 4432: 		    end,
 4433: 		    [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4434:     false = erlang:check_process_code(element(1, LTL), nonexisting_module),
 4435:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(element(1, LTL)),
 4436:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4437: 			  unlink(P),
 4438: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4439: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4440:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4441: 			  receive
 4442: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4443: 				  ok
 4444: 			  end
 4445: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4446:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4447:     ok.
 4448: 
 4449: no_priority_inversion2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4450:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4451:     Master = self(),
 4452:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4453:     MTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4454: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4455:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4456: 					       tok_loop()
 4457: 				       end,
 4458: 				       [{priority, max},
 4459:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4460:                                         monitor, link])
 4461: 		     end,
 4462: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4463:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, MTLs),
 4464:     {PL, ML} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4465: 			       tok_loop()
 4466: 		       end,
 4467: 		       [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4468:     RL = request_test(PL, low),
 4469:     RN = request_test(PL, normal),
 4470:     RH = request_test(PL, high),
 4471:     receive
 4472: 	{system_task_test, _, _} ->
 4473: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_system_task_completed)
 4474:     after 1000 ->
 4475: 	    ok
 4476:     end,
 4477:     RM = request_test(PL, max),
 4478:     receive
 4479: 	{system_task_test, RM, true} ->
 4480: 	    ok
 4481:     end,
 4482:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4483: 			  unlink(P),
 4484: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4485: 		  end, MTLs),
 4486:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4487: 			  receive
 4488: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4489: 				  ok
 4490: 			  end
 4491: 		  end, MTLs),
 4492:     receive
 4493: 	{system_task_test, RH, true} ->
 4494: 	    ok
 4495:     end,
 4496:     receive
 4497: 	{system_task_test, RN, true} ->
 4498: 	    ok
 4499:     end,
 4500:     receive
 4501: 	{system_task_test, RL, true} ->
 4502: 	    ok
 4503:     end,
 4504:     unlink(PL),
 4505:     exit(PL, kill),
 4506:     receive
 4507: 	{'DOWN', ML, process, PL, killed} ->
 4508: 	    ok
 4509:     end,
 4510:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4511:     ok.
 4512: 
 4513: request_test(Pid, Prio) ->
 4514:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4515:     erts_internal:request_system_task(Pid, Prio, {system_task_test, Ref}),
 4516:     Ref.
 4517: 
 4518: system_task_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4519:     Me = self(),
 4520:     GCReq = fun () ->
 4521: 		    RL = test_req(Me, 100),
 4522: 		    lists:foreach(fun (R) ->
 4523: 					  receive
 4524: 					      {system_task_test, R, true} ->
 4525: 						  ok
 4526: 					  end
 4527: 				  end, RL),
 4528: 		    exit(it_worked)
 4529: 	    end,
 4530:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (_) -> spawn_monitor(GCReq) end, lists:seq(1, 1000)),
 4531:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4532: 			  receive
 4533: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, it_worked} ->
 4534: 				  ok
 4535: 			  end
 4536: 		  end, HTLs),
 4537:     ok.
 4538: 
 4539: test_req(_Pid, 0) ->
 4540:     [];
 4541: test_req(Pid, N) ->
 4542:     R0 = request_test(Pid, low),
 4543:     R1 = request_test(Pid, normal),
 4544:     R2 = request_test(Pid, high),
 4545:     R3 = request_test(Pid, max),
 4546:     [R0, R1, R2, R3 | test_req(Pid, N-1)].
 4547: 
 4548: system_task_on_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4549:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 4550: 				   tok_loop()
 4551: 			   end),
 4552:     true = erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4553:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4554:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(P),
 4555:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4556:     true = erlang:resume_process(P),
 4557:     false = ({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)),
 4558:     exit(P, kill),
 4559:     receive
 4560: 	{'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4561: 	    ok
 4562:     end.
 4563: 
 4564: %% When a system task couldn't be enqueued due to the process being in an
 4565: %% incompatible state, it would linger in the system task list and get executed
 4566: %% anyway the next time the process was scheduled. This would result in a
 4567: %% double-free at best.
 4568: %%
 4569: %% This test continuously purges modules while other processes run dirty code,
 4570: %% which will provoke this error as ERTS_PSTT_CPC can't be enqueued while a
 4571: %% process is running dirty code.
 4572: system_task_failed_enqueue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4573:     case erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) of
 4574:         N when N > 0 ->
 4575:             system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config);
 4576:         _ ->
 4577:             {skipped, "No dirty scheduler support"}
 4578:     end.
 4579: 
 4580: system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config) ->
 4581:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4582: 
 4583:     Purgers = [spawn_link(fun() -> purge_loop(Priv, Id) end)
 4584:                || Id <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers))],
 4585:     Hogs = [spawn_link(fun() -> dirty_loop() end)
 4586:             || _ <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers))],
 4587: 
 4588:     ct:sleep(5000),
 4589: 
 4590:     [begin
 4591:          unlink(Pid),
 4592:          exit(Pid, kill)
 4593:      end || Pid <- (Purgers ++ Hogs)],
 4594: 
 4595:     ok.
 4596: 
 4597: purge_loop(PrivDir, Id) ->
 4598:     Mod = "failed_enq_" ++ integer_to_list(Id),
 4599:     Path = PrivDir ++ "/" ++ Mod,
 4600:     file:write_file(Path ++ ".erl",
 4601:                     "-module('" ++ Mod ++ "').\n" ++
 4602:                         "-export([t/0]).\n" ++
 4603:                         "t() -> ok."),
 4604:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4605: purge_loop_1(Path) ->
 4606:     {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Path, []),
 4607:     erlang:delete_module(Mod),
 4608:     erts_code_purger:purge(Mod),
 4609:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4610: 
 4611: dirty_loop() ->
 4612:     ok = erts_debug:dirty_cpu(reschedule, 10000),
 4613:     dirty_loop().
 4614: 
 4615: gc_request_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4616:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4617:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ref),
 4618:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(immed),
 4619:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS).
 4620: 
 4621: gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ReqIdType) ->
 4622:     Master = self(),
 4623:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4624: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4625: 								    false),
 4626: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4627: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4628: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, true},
 4629: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4630: 								     true),
 4631: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4632: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4633:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4634:     ReqId = case ReqIdType of
 4635:                 ref -> make_ref();
 4636:                 immed -> immed
 4637:             end,
 4638:     async = garbage_collect(P, [{async, ReqId}]),
 4639:     receive
 4640: 	{garbage_collect, ReqId, Result} ->
 4641: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_gc, Result});
 4642: 	{P, gc_state, true} ->
 4643: 	    ok
 4644:     end,
 4645:     receive {garbage_collect, ReqId, true} -> ok end,
 4646:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4647:     ok.
 4648: 
 4649: gc_request_blast_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4650:     Master = self(),
 4651:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4652:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4653: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4654: 								    false),
 4655: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4656: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4657: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4658: 								     true),
 4659: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4660: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4661:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4662:     PMs = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4663: 			    Prio = case N rem 4 of
 4664: 				       0 -> max;
 4665: 				       1 -> high;
 4666: 				       2 -> normal;
 4667: 				       3 -> low
 4668: 				   end,
 4669: 			    spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4670: 					      erlang:garbage_collect(P)
 4671: 				      end, [monitor, link, {priority, Prio}])
 4672: 		    end, lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4673:     lists:foreach(fun ({Proc, Mon}) ->
 4674: 			  receive
 4675: 			      {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc, normal} ->
 4676: 				  ok
 4677: 			  end
 4678: 		  end,
 4679: 		  PMs),
 4680:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS),
 4681:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4682:     ok.
 4683: 
 4684: otp_16436(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4685:     P = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4686:                           erts_debug:dirty_io(wait, 1000)
 4687:                   end,
 4688:                   [{priority,high},link]),
 4689:     erlang:check_process_code(P, non_existing),
 4690:     unlink(P),
 4691:     exit(P, kill),
 4692:     ok.
 4693: 
 4694: otp_16642(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4695:     %%
 4696:     %% Whitebox testing...
 4697:     %%
 4698:     %% Ensure that low prio system tasks are interleaved with
 4699:     %% normal prio system tasks as they should.
 4700:     %%
 4701:     process_flag(priority, high),
 4702:     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 4703:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4704:                     [link, {scheduler, 1}]),
 4705:     ReqSTasks = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4706:                         lists:foreach(
 4707:                           fun (N) ->
 4708:                                   erts_internal:request_system_task(
 4709:                                     Pid,
 4710:                                     Prio,
 4711:                                     {system_task_test,
 4712:                                      {Prio, N}})
 4713:                           end,
 4714:                           lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4715:                 end,
 4716:     MkResList = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4717:                         lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4718:                                           {system_task_test,
 4719:                                            {Prio, N},
 4720:                                            true}
 4721:                                   end,
 4722:                                   lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4723:                 end,
 4724: 
 4725:     %%% Test when normal queue clears first...
 4726: 
 4727:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4728:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 10),
 4729:     ReqSTasks(low, 2, 4),
 4730:     ReqSTasks(normal, 11, 26),
 4731: 
 4732:     Msgs1 = recv_msgs(32),
 4733:     io:format("Got test 1 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs1]),
 4734: 
 4735:     ExpMsgs1 =
 4736:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4737:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4738:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4739:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4740:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 23)
 4741:         ++ MkResList(low, 2, 2)
 4742:         ++ MkResList(normal, 24, 26)
 4743:         ++ MkResList(low, 3, 4),
 4744:     
 4745:     case Msgs1 =:= ExpMsgs1 of
 4746:         true ->
 4747:             ok;
 4748:         false ->
 4749:             io:format("Expected test 1 messages ~p~n",
 4750:                       [ExpMsgs1]),
 4751:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4752:     end,
 4753: 
 4754:     receive Unexp1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp1})
 4755:     after 500 -> ok
 4756:     end,
 4757: 
 4758:     io:format("Test 1 as expected~n", []),
 4759: 
 4760:     %%% Test when low queue clears first...
 4761: 
 4762:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4763:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 20),
 4764: 
 4765:     Msgs2 = recv_msgs(23),
 4766:     io:format("Got test 2 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs2]),
 4767: 
 4768:     ExpMsgs2 =
 4769:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4770:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4771:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4772:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4773:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 20),
 4774:     
 4775:     case Msgs2 =:= ExpMsgs2 of
 4776:         true ->
 4777:             ok;
 4778:         false ->
 4779:             io:format("Expected test 2 messages ~p~n",
 4780:                       [ExpMsgs2]),
 4781:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4782:     end,
 4783: 
 4784:     receive Unexp2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp2})
 4785:     after 500 -> ok
 4786:     end,
 4787: 
 4788:     io:format("Test 2 as expected~n", []),
 4789: 
 4790:     unlink(Pid),
 4791:     exit(Pid, kill),
 4792:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 4793:     ok.
 4794: 
 4795: pid_ref_table_size() ->
 4796:     erts_debug:get_internal_state(pid_ref_table_size).
 4797: 
 4798: check_pid_ref_table_size(PRTSz) ->
 4799:     receive after 500 -> ok end,
 4800:     case pid_ref_table_size() of
 4801:         PRTSz ->
 4802:             ok;
 4803:         NewPRTSz ->
 4804:             ct:fail({port_ref_table_size_mismatch, PRTSz, NewPRTSz})
 4805:     end.
 4806: 
 4807: alias_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4808:     PRTSz = pid_ref_table_size(),
 4809:     alias_bif_test(node()),
 4810:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4811:     alias_bif_test(Node),
 4812:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4813:     check_pid_ref_table_size(PRTSz),
 4814:     ok.
 4815: 
 4816: alias_bif_test(Node) ->
 4817:     A1 = alias(),
 4818:     {P1, M1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4819:                              fun () ->
 4820:                                      A1 ! {A1, 1},
 4821:                                      A1 ! {A1, 2},
 4822:                                      [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4823:                                      A1 ! {A1, 3},
 4824:                                      A1 ! {A1, 4}
 4825:                              end),
 4826:     [{A1,1},{A1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4827:     unalias(A1),
 4828:     P1 ! {A1, continue},
 4829:     [{'DOWN', M1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4830: 
 4831:     A2 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 4832:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4833:                              fun () ->
 4834:                                      A2 ! {A2, 1},
 4835:                                      A2 ! {A2, 2},
 4836:                                      [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4837:                                      A2 ! {A2, 3},
 4838:                                      A2 ! {A2, 4}
 4839:                              end),
 4840:     [{A2,1},{A2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4841:     unalias(A2),
 4842:     P2 ! {A2, continue},
 4843:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4844:     
 4845:     A3 = alias([reply]),
 4846:     {_P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4847:                               fun () ->
 4848:                                       A3 ! {A3, 1},
 4849:                                       A3 ! {A3, 2},
 4850:                                       A3 ! {A3, 3},
 4851:                                       A3 ! {A3, 4}
 4852:                               end),
 4853:     [{A3,1},{'DOWN', M3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4854:     ok.
 4855: 
 4856: dist_frag_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4857:     Tester = self(),
 4858:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4859:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4860:                           fun () ->
 4861:                                   Alias = alias(),
 4862:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 4863:                                   receive
 4864:                                       {data, Data} ->
 4865:                                           garbage_collect(),
 4866:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data}
 4867:                                   end,
 4868:                                   exit(end_of_test)
 4869:                           end),
 4870:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 4871:     receive
 4872:         {alias, Alias} ->
 4873:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 4874:             receive
 4875:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 4876:                     Data = RecvData;
 4877:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 4878:                     ct:fail(R2)
 4879:             end;
 4880:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 4881:             ct:fail(R1)
 4882:     end,
 4883:     receive
 4884:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 4885:             end_of_test = R3
 4886:     end,
 4887:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4888:     ok.
 4889: 
 4890: dist_frag_unaliased(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4891:     %% Leak fixed by PR-7915 would have been detected using asan or valgrind
 4892:     %% when running this test...
 4893:     Tester = self(),
 4894:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4895:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4896:                           fun () ->
 4897:                                   Alias = alias(),
 4898:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 4899:                                   receive
 4900:                                       {data, Data} ->
 4901:                                           garbage_collect(),
 4902:                                           unalias(Alias),
 4903:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data},
 4904:                                           receive
 4905:                                               {data, _Data} ->
 4906:                                                   exit(received_data_again);
 4907:                                               end_of_test ->
 4908:                                                   exit(end_of_test)
 4909:                                           end
 4910:                                   end
 4911:                           end),
 4912:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 4913:     receive
 4914:         {alias, Alias} ->
 4915:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 4916:             receive
 4917:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 4918:                     Data = RecvData;
 4919:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 4920:                     ct:fail(R2)
 4921:             end,
