 4922:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 4923:             P ! end_of_test;
 4924:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 4925:             ct:fail(R1)
 4926:     end,
 4927:     receive
 4928:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 4929:             end_of_test = R3
 4930:     end,
 4931:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4932:     ok.
 4933: 
 4934: monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4935:     PRTSz = pid_ref_table_size(),
 4936:     monitor_alias_test(node()),
 4937:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4938:     monitor_alias_test(Node),
 4939:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4940:     check_pid_ref_table_size(PRTSz),
 4941:     ok.
 4942: 
 4943: monitor_alias_test(Node) ->
 4944:     P1 = spawn(Node,
 4945:                fun () ->
 4946:                        [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4947:                        A1 ! {A1, 1},
 4948:                        A1 ! {A1, 2},
 4949:                        [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4950:                        A1 ! {A1, 3},
 4951:                        A1 ! {A1, 4}
 4952:                end),
 4953:     MA1 = monitor(process, P1, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 4954:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 4955:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4956:     unalias(MA1),
 4957:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 4958:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4959: 
 4960:     P2 = spawn(Node,
 4961:                fun () ->
 4962:                        [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4963:                        A2 ! {A2, 1},
 4964:                        A2 ! {A2, 2},
 4965:                        [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4966:                        A2 ! {A2, 3},
 4967:                        A2 ! {A2, 4}
 4968:                end),
 4969:     MA2 = monitor(process, P2, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 4970:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 4971:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4972:     demonitor(MA2),
 4973:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 4974:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 4975:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4976: 
 4977:     P3 = spawn(Node,
 4978:                fun () ->
 4979:                        [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4980:                        A3 ! {A3, 1},
 4981:                        A3 ! {A3, 2}
 4982:                end),
 4983:     MA3 = monitor(process, P3, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 4984:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 4985:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 4986:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4987:                                   fun () ->
 4988:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 4989:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4}
 4990:                                   end),
 4991:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4992:     
 4993:     P4 = spawn(Node,
 4994:                fun () ->
 4995:                        [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1)
 4996:                end),
 4997:     MA4 = monitor(process, P4, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 4998:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 4999:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5000:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5001:                                   fun () ->
 5002:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5003:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4}
 5004:                                   end),
 5005:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5006: 
 5007:     P5 = spawn(Node,
 5008:                fun () ->
 5009:                        [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5010:                        A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5011:                        A5 ! {A5, 2}
 5012:                end),
 5013:     MA5 = monitor(process, P5, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5014:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5015:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5016:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5017: 
 5018:     ok.
 5019:     
 5020: 
 5021: spawn_monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5022:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5023:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons.
 5024:     PRTSz = pid_ref_table_size(),
 5025:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, normal),
 5026:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5027:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, normal),
 5028:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5029:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5030:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, normal),
 5031:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5032:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5033:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5034:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_request, normal),
 5035:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5036:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5037:     check_pid_ref_table_size(PRTSz),
 5038:     ok.
 5039: 
 5040: spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, ExitReason) ->
 5041:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5042:                 spawn_opt ->
 5043:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5044:                             try
 5045:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5046:                             catch
 5047:                                 error:Err ->
 5048:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5049:                             end
 5050:                     end;
 5051:                 spawn_request ->
 5052:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5053:                             try
 5054:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5055:                                 receive
 5056:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5057:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5058:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5059:                                         error(Error)
 5060:                                 end
 5061:                             catch
 5062:                                 error:Err ->
 5063:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5064:                             end
 5065:                     end
 5066:             end,
 5067: 
 5068:     SpawnError = fun (OptList) ->
 5069:                          try
 5070:                              Spawn(fun () -> ok end, OptList),
 5071:                              error(ignored_error)
 5072:                          catch
 5073:                              error:{SpawnType, badarg} when SpawnType == spawn_opt ->
 5074:                                  ok;
 5075:                              error:{SpawnType, badopt} when SpawnType == spawn_request ->
 5076:                                  ok
 5077:                          end
 5078:                  end,
 5079: 
 5080:     SpawnError([{monitor, {{alias, explicit_unalias}}}]),
 5081:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{alias,alias}]}]),
 5082:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{aliases,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5083:     SpawnError([{monitors, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5084:     
 5085:     {P1, MA1} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5086:                               [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5087:                               A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5088:                               A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5089:                               [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5090:                               A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5091:                               A1 ! {A1, 4},
 5092:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5093:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5094:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5095:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5096:     unalias(MA1),
 5097:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5098:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5099: 
 5100:     {P2, MA2} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5101:                               [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5102:                               A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5103:                               A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5104:                               [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5105:                               A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5106:                               A2 ! {A2, 4},
 5107:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5108:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5109:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5110:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5111:     demonitor(MA2),
 5112:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5113:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5114:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5115: 
 5116:     {P3, MA3} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5117:                               [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5118:                               A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5119:                               A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5120:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5121:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5122:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5123:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5124:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5125:                                   fun () ->
 5126:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5127:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4},
 5128:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5129:                                   end),
 5130:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5131:     
 5132:     {P4, MA4} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5133:                               [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5134:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5135:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5136:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5137:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5138:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5139:                                   fun () ->
 5140:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5141:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4},
 5142:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5143:                                   end),
 5144:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5145: 
 5146:     {P5, MA5} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5147:                               [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5148:                               A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5149:                               A5 ! {A5, 2},
 5150:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5151:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5152:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5153:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5154:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5155: 
 5156:     case Node == node() of
 5157:         true ->
 5158:             ok;
 5159:         false ->
 5160:             {P6, MA6} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5161:                                       [{alias, A6}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5162:                                       A6 ! {A6, 1},
 5163:                                       A6 ! {A6, 2},
 5164:                                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 5165:                               end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5166:             P6 ! {alias, MA6},
 5167:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5168:             [{MA6,1},{MA6,2},{'DOWN', MA6, _, _, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5169:             {_P6_1, M6_1} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 5170:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 3},
 5171:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 4}
 5172:                                           end),
 5173:             [{'DOWN', M6_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5174:     
 5175:             ok
 5176:     end.
 5177: 
 5178: alias_process_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5179:     Tester = self(),
 5180:     CreatedAliases = make_ref(),
 5181:     PRTSz = pid_ref_table_size(),
 5182:     P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5183:                            A0 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 5184:                            A1 = alias([reply]),
 5185:                            A2 = monitor(process, Tester, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5186:                            A3 = monitor(process, Tester, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5187:                            A4 = monitor(process, Tester, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5188:                            Tester ! CreatedAliases,
 5189:                            receive after infinity -> ok end,
 5190:                            some_module:some_function([A0, A1, A2, A3, A4])
 5191:                    end),
 5192:     receive CreatedAliases -> ok end,
 5193:     PRTSz = erts_debug:get_internal_state(pid_ref_table_size) - 5,
 5194:     unlink(P),
 5195:     exit(P, kill),
 5196:     false = is_process_alive(P),
 5197:     check_pid_ref_table_size(PRTSz),
 5198:     ok.
 5199: 
 5200: demonitor_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5201:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5202:     Fun = fun () ->
 5203:                   receive
 5204:                       {alias, Alias} ->
 5205:                           Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5206:                   end
 5207:           end,
 5208:     LPid = spawn(Fun),
 5209:     RPid = spawn(Node, Fun),
 5210:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5211:     erlang:demonitor(AliasMonitor),
 5212:     LPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5213:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, LPid} -> ok end,
 5214:     %% Demonitor signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5215:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5216:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5217:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5218:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5219:     exit(LPid, kill),
 5220:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5221:     false = is_process_alive(LPid),
 5222:     ok.
 5223: 
 5224: down_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5225:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5226:     LPid = spawn(fun () -> receive infinty -> ok end end),
 5227:     RPid = spawn(Node,
 5228:                  fun () ->
 5229:                          receive
 5230:                              {alias, Alias} ->
 5231:                                  Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5232:                          end
 5233:                  end),
 5234:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5235:     exit(LPid, bye),
 5236:     receive {'DOWN', AliasMonitor, process, LPid, bye} -> ok end,
 5237:     %% Down signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5238:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5239:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5240:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5241:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5242:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5243:     ok.
 5244: 
 5245: monitor_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5246:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5247:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons, and
 5248:     %% immediate tags are stored in a different manner than
 5249:     %% compound tags.
 5250:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5251:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5252:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5253:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5254:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5255:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5256:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5257:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5258:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5259:     monitor_tag_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5260:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5261:     monitor_tag_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5262:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5263:     monitor_tag_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5264:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5265:     monitor_tag_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5266:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5267:     monitor_tag_test(Peer5, Node5, spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5268:     {ok, Peer6, Node6} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5269:     monitor_tag_test(Peer6, Node6, spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5270:     {ok, Peer7, Node7} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5271:     monitor_tag_test(Peer7, Node7, spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5272:     {ok, Peer8, Node8} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5273:     monitor_tag_test(Peer8, Node8, spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5274:     ok.
 5275: 
 5276: monitor_tag_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, Tag, ExitReason) ->
 5277: 
 5278:     P1 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive go -> ok end, exit(ExitReason) end),
 5279:     M1 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5280:     P1 ! go,
 5281:     [{Tag, M1, process, P1, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5282: 
 5283:     M1_2 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5284:     [{Tag, M1_2, process, P1, noproc}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5285: 
 5286:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5287:                 spawn_opt ->
 5288:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5289:                             try
 5290:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5291:                             catch
 5292:                                 error:Err ->
 5293:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5294:                             end
 5295:                     end;
 5296:                 spawn_request ->
 5297:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5298:                             try
 5299:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5300:                                 receive
 5301:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5302:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5303:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5304:                                         error(Error)
 5305:                                 end
 5306:                             catch
 5307:                                 error:Err ->
 5308:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5309:                             end
 5310:                     end
 5311:             end,
 5312: 
 5313:     {P2, M2} = Spawn(fun () -> exit(ExitReason) end, [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5314:     [{Tag, M2, process, P2, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5315: 
 5316:     case Node == node() of
 5317:         true ->
 5318:             ok;
 5319:         false ->
 5320:             {P3, M3} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5321:                              [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5322:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5323:             [{Tag, M3, process, P3, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5324: 
 5325:             case SpawnType == spawn_opt of
 5326:                 true ->
 5327:                     {P6, M6} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5328:                                      [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5329:                     [{Tag, M6, process, P6, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1);
 5330:                 false ->
 5331:                     ok
 5332:             end,
 5333:             ok
 5334:     end.
 5335: 
 5336: %% Internal functions
 5337: 
 5338: recv_msgs(N) ->
 5339:     recv_msgs(N, []).
 5340: 
 5341: recv_msgs(0, Msgs) ->
 5342:     lists:reverse(Msgs);
 5343: recv_msgs(N, Msgs) ->
 5344:     receive
 5345:         Msg ->
 5346:             recv_msgs(N-1, [Msg|Msgs])
 5347:     end.
 5348: 
 5349: wait_until(Fun) ->
 5350:     case Fun() of
 5351: 	true -> true;
 5352: 	false -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
 5353:     end.
 5354: 
 5355: tok_loop() ->
 5356:     tok_loop(hej).
 5357: 
 5358: tok_loop(hej) ->
 5359:     tok_loop(hopp);
 5360: tok_loop(hopp) ->
 5361:     tok_loop(hej).
 5362: 
 5363: id(I) -> I.
 5364: 
 5365: stop_node(Peer, Node) ->
 5366:     verify_nc(node()),
 5367:     verify_nc(Node),
 5368:     peer:stop(Peer).
 5369: 
 5370: verify_nc(Node) ->
 5371:     P = self(),
 5372:     Ref = make_ref(),
 5373:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 5374:                 fun() ->
 5375:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 5376:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 5377:                 end),
 5378:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 5379:     receive
 5380:         {Ref, ok} ->
 5381:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 5382:             ok;
 5383:         {Ref, Error} ->
 5384:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 5385:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 5386:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5387:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 5388:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 5389:     end.
 5390: 
 5391: enable_internal_state() ->
 5392:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 5393: 	true -> true;
 5394: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 5395:     end.
 5396: 
 5397: sys_mem_cond_run(OrigReqSizeMB, TestFun) when is_integer(OrigReqSizeMB) ->
 5398:     %% Debug normally needs more memory, so double the requirement
 5399:     Debug = erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 5400:     ReqSizeMB = if Debug -> OrigReqSizeMB * 2; true -> OrigReqSizeMB end,
 5401:     case total_memory() of
 5402: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem), TotMem >= ReqSizeMB ->
 5403: 	    TestFun();
 5404: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem) ->
 5405: 	    {skipped, "Not enough memory ("++integer_to_list(TotMem)++" MB)"};
 5406: 	undefined ->
 5407: 	    {skipped, "Could not retrieve memory information"}
 5408:     end.
 5409: 
 5410: 
 5411: total_memory() ->
 5412:     %% Total memory in MB.
 5413:     try
 5414: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 5415:         TM = proplists:get_value(
 5416:                available_memory, SMD,
 5417:                proplists:get_value(
 5418:                  total_memory, SMD,
 5419:                  proplists:get_value(
 5420:                    system_total_memory, SMD))),
 5421:         TM div (1024*1024)
 5422:     catch
 5423: 	_ : _ ->
 5424: 	    undefined
 5425:     end.
 5426: 
 5427: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5428:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 5429:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"),
 5430:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 5431:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 5432:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 5433:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 5434:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 5435:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 5436:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 5437:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 5438:     Parent = self(),
 5439:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5440:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 5441:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5442:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 5443:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 5444:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 5445:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 5446:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 5447:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 5448:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 5449:                              receive
 5450:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 5451:                              end,
 5452:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 5453:                      end),
 5454:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 5455:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5456:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 5457:         Error -> Error
 5458:     end.
 5459: 
 5460: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 5461:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5462:     case get(Key) of
 5463:         undefined ->
 5464:             {error, no_handler};
 5465:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5466:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 5467:             receive
 5468:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 5469:                     Res
 5470:             after 3000 ->
 5471:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 5472:             end
 5473:     end.
 5474: 
 5475: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 5476:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5477:         ok ->
 5478:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5479:             case get(Key) of
 5480:                 undefined ->
 5481:                     {error, no_handler};
 5482:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5483:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 5484:                     receive
 5485:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 5486:                             put(Key, undefined),
 5487:                             ok
 5488:                     after 2000 ->
 5489:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 5490:                     end
 5491:             end;
 5492:         Error ->
 5493:             Error
 5494:     end.
 5495: 
 5496: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 5497:     receive
 5498:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 5499:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5500:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5501:             exit(Reason);
 5502:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 5503:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5504:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5505:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 5506:             exit(normal);
 5507:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 5508:             Ref = make_ref(),
 5509:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 5510:             receive
 5511:                 Ref ->
 5512:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 5513:             after
 5514:                 2000 ->
 5515:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 5516:             end;
 5517:         Msg ->
 5518:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 5519:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5520:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5521:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 5522:     end,
 5523:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 5524: 
 5525: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 5526:     receive
 5527:         Msg ->
 5528:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 5529:     after
 5530:         0 ->
 5531:             Msgs
 5532:     end.
 5533: 
 5534: get_hostname() ->
 5535:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 5536: 
 5537: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 5538:     HostName;
 5539: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 5540:     get_hostname(Rest).
 5541: 
 5542: receive_any() ->
 5543:     receive M -> M end.
